sentences.sContent: Her performance contains a strong element of self-parody (= when someone makes fun of their own style ) .
sentences.sCn: 她的表演包含了强烈的自嘲元素。

remMethod.val: par (平等) + ody ( = ode， 唱) → 同样唱歌， 总觉得模仿的人技巧很拙劣 → 拙劣的模仿

words.tran: 诙谐文作者；打油诗作者

trans.tranCn: 拙劣的模仿；诙谐的改编诗文
trans.tranOther: something that is not a correct or acceptable example of something
to copy someone or something in a way that makes people laugh
